medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Mr. ___ was in his usual state of health until this afternoon when he developed mild right lower quadrant (RLQ) pain. The pain was initially mild, then intensified, was sharp and non-radiating. Approximately 1 hour after consuming a protein shake, he developed intense cramping type RLQ pain. He experienced nausea and two episodes of vomiting during the afternoon and evening.
medical_history.past_medical_history: ADHD, HLD, Depression, Recent history of abdominal pain associated with diarrhea.
